Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is worth $10000 to you, and we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable product to you for a special introductory price of $9500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant value compared to its market worth. We look forward to your consideration and hope to see this product contribute to your success. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
